I wanted to get an Apple Watch for myself as I was impressed by the design but fortunately as I thought being a fitness goals this Noise ColorFit will be ok as, which looks very similar and premium like the Apple watch. Bought this one for $.18.99.

review.name: Kavitha C P
review.comment: Watch is good. Light weight. Battery backup is best . If you didnt connect with mobile and use it may take upto 2-4 days backup unless it take 1-2 days mlConnection with mobile sometimes takes a little bit time but if you restart it then itvwill connect easily, features are limited. Within this range you can get lot of features nowadays. But its perfect
